@Dzxwind  what kind of data do you want? the raw series.data or the data of the current chart,  these two are different within ECharts. While inside ECharts the raw series.data will be transformed into the data of the current chart after some processing.
@lsai2270 You can open an issue about the `remove()` in https://github.com/sakitam-fdd/ol3Echarts
@lsq525625  In addition to setting `option.color`, you can also set [series-line.lineStyle.color](https://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#series-line.lineStyle.color)
Fixed and will be released in 4.2.0-rc.3.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6141342/51151223-0390c300-18a5-11e9-88bd-20c8630bdc3c.png)

2、如果把xAxis.splitNumber 去掉，xAxis.interval 设置为1，效果也是49看不到。

@lsq525625  Currently, There is no way to get the color of the legend. You can only modify the color of the legend by modifying the color of the corresponding series, except the pie chart which you can modify the `itemStyle.color`.
解决了，可以给legend的textStyle设置padding值，来调节一下
@lsq525625  It would be better if you can tell me why you want to get the color of legend.
@lvybriage  You can format the `parallelAxis` label.  https://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#parallelAxis.axisLabel.formatter
@yu-cover  sorry, I'm confused about what you want. Is [this](https://www.echartsjs.com/examples/editor.html?c=graph-simple) what you want?
@pauturvalles  sorry, I am confused about what you want? It would be better if you can provide a picture/demo about what effect you want.

> @pauturvalles sorry, I am confused about what you want? It would be better if you can provide a picture/demo about what effect you want.

Sure, sorry! What I mean is writing the little numbers that you often find in mathematical formulas, as the number two in the following formula: [
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39550076/51184661-410d4480-18d5-11e9-8fa0-f998521fbeab.png)
](url)

I would like to know how can I write those numbers in a label. Thanks again!

Edit: reopening issue, I don't know how I closed it but it was a mistake.

@Ovilia , 你的例子是固定间隔的，我这边想自定义合并。按照你给的example，写了一个例子，但是有两个问题：
1. 分割线，分割不正确；
2. 次类目轴，合并后，label名称怎么能够置中
——————————————————————
例子：https://codepen.io/AliJser/pen/maogyj
想实现的目标：'2017Q1', '2017Q2', '2017Q3', '2017Q4' 归到 类目1，其他归到 类目2

谢谢~~
@cheqianxiao  I have tested it in our [official example](https://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=bar-simple) and it works well, you can try it.
You can see this [tutorial](https://www.echartsjs.com/tutorial.html#%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E6%9E%84%E5%BB%BA%20ECharts).

if do not set the `dimensions`, the thumbnail will show like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32190667/51297877-439aa600-1a5d-11e9-9c41-5c8975e84045.png)
after setting the `dimensions`, the thumbnail:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32190667/51297929-70e75400-1a5d-11e9-987d-2828ceca9016.png)
@deqingli  The official example runs with echarts@4.2.0 , this bug happens in 4.1.0 .

@xj785292159 改动大吗？pr一下呗
请问这个问题是怎么解决的?

> 请问这个问题是怎么解决的?

setOption会合并新的参数和数据，然后刷新图表，应为切换到饼图的时候没有传坐标轴数据，所以合并后还有坐标轴配置项
My mistake. Approved

> @xj785292159 改动大吗？pr一下呗

看源码 找focusNodeAdjacency相关内容 更改其方法，主要t是target，source，node的关系
参考[富文本标签](https://echarts.baidu.com/tutorial.html#%E5%AF%8C%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE)

> 参考[富文本标签](https://echarts.baidu.com/tutorial.html#%E5%AF%8C%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE)
图例旋转怎么弄，图例旋转好像这个不能用
只能配合图例文本旋转+修改图标了，整个是没有支持的

我也遇到了类似的问题，我的需求是动态改变柱子颜色，如果鼠标落在某个柱子上，该柱子就不会变颜色，除非移走鼠，等待下次更新数据才会变，具体事例见：
https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xQQQcc5ZCJ&comment=0
我也碰到了这个问题，在setOption方法之前，通过添加clear方法清除一下数据，就可解决这个问题了
